Docs.param: The package name of the application to enable

The new enabled state for the component. The legal values for this state are: Android.Content.PM.PackageManager.COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE_ENABLED, Android.Content.PM.PackageManager.COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE_DISABLED and Android.Content.PM.PackageManager.COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE_DEFAULT The last one removes the setting, thereby restoring the applications's state to whatever was set in its manifest (or enabled, by default).
Optional behavior flags: or 0.
Docs.summary: Set the enabled setting for an application This setting will override any enabled state which may have been set by the application in its manifest.
